h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations
content: Another Mind Core can be found in a chest on the right side of the Kingdom of Sahali area in Yellow Wind Ridge. This needs to be done before defeating Fuban as the area becomes inaccessible.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Mind Core Location 10'.
The content is as follows:
Another Mind Core can be found in a chest on the right side of the Kingdom of Sahali area in Yellow Wind Ridge. This needs to be done before defeating Fuban as the area becomes inaccessible.
